citation: Proclamation under the Public Health Amendment (Healthy Tasmania) Act 2017 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Public Health Amendment (Healthy Tasmania) Act 2017

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Public Health Amendment (Healthy Tasmania) Act 2017 fix 29 November 2017 as the day on which that Act commences.

20 November 2017

A. M. BLOW

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Health

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 November 2017
